snippet: A report outlines failures by prosecutors to live up to their obligation to turn over to the defense information that could have resulted in Senator Ted Stevens’s acquittal.
abstract: Court-appointed investigator concludes that federal prosecutors Joseph W Bottini and James A Goeke intentionally withheld key exculpatory evidence from the defense team in the botched ethics trial of the late Sen Ted Stevens.

byline.original: By CHARLIE SAVAGE and MICHAEL S. SCHMIDT

lead_paragraph: A report outlines failures by prosecutors to live up to their obligation to turn over to the defense information that could have resulted in Senator Ted Stevens’s acquittal.

headline.seo: Report Details Inner Workings of Troubled Ethics Trial of Senator Ted Stevens
headline.main: Inner Workings of Senator’s Troubled Trial Detailed
headline.print_headline: Inner Workings of Senator’s Troubled Trial Detailed
